text: Keyamatera jnana ekamatra tamra'i jana. Tamra jnanera ba'ire kona phala abaranamukta haya na. Ebam kona nari garbhadharana o santana prasaba kare na. Yedina allaha taderake deke balabena, amara sarikara kothaya? Sedina tara balabe, amara apanake bale diyechi ye, amadera ke'u eta sbikara kare na.
